name: Face to Face
description:
Face-to-Face is a interactive short game about talking to what you believe is an online friend in a futuristic virtual reality chatroom system. Through the gameplay of choosing narrative options, the player must figure out the truth behind this program and their own reality. The short story can be completed in around 5 to 10 minutes.

The focus of this project was the 3D model and animation of the head.
